properties.verseOrder: v1 v1 v2 v1 c1 v1 b1

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: Falling on my knees in worship newline Giving all I am to seek Your face newline Lord all I am is Yours

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: My whole life I place in Your hands newline God of mercy humbled I bow down newline In Your presence, at Your throne

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: I called You answered newline And You came to my rescue and I, newline I wanna be where You are

verse.name: b1
verse.lines: In my life, be lifted high newline In our world, be lifted high newline In our love, be lifted high
